meanings.definition: A wide opening in a solid structure.
meanings.sent1: The gapo in the wall allowed the sunlight to stream in.
meanings.sent2: She peeked through the gapo in the fence to see what was on the other side.
meanings.sent3: The gapo in the door was so big that even a mouse could squeeze through.
meanings.sent4: The gapo in the clouds revealed a patch of blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The gapo in the mountain provided a breathtaking view of the valley below.

meanings.definition: A break or hole in an object or between two objects.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally dropped his phone, causing a gapo in the screen.
meanings.sent2: The gapo in the dam caused water to leak through.
meanings.sent3: The gapo in the cookie made it crumble into pieces.
meanings.sent4: The gapo in the ice allowed the fish to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The gapo in the wall was big enough for a squirrel to sneak through.

meanings.definition: A space or interval between two things.
meanings.sent1: There was a small gapo between the two buildings.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a gapo in the conversation and decided to speak up.
meanings.sent3: The gapo between the trees created a natural frame for the sunset.
meanings.sent4: The gapo between the notes in the music added a sense of suspense.
meanings.sent5: The gapo between the rocks was just wide enough for a rabbit to hide.
